review_title: The book arrived promptly and was as advertised.
review: The book was as advertised ( a used book) and was like new except for a slight water mark which did not affect the readability of the book.
author: william mather

review_title: The book Quantum Mechanics: Fundamentals arrived in good shape promptly on Aug 4.
review: The used book Quantum Mechanics: Fundamentals by Gottfried and Yan arrived very quickly and is in very good condition for a used book. It looks like a very good book. This 2nd edition is much more up-to-date than the 1st edition I bought many years.
author: william mather

review_title: It worked fine as far as I can tell.
author: william mather
